provider-test.spec:
Response Code 406 Failures of this type occur when ... Create Response Code 406... Adjust Response Code 406... Verify Response Code 406... Investigate Response Code 406...
OSLC provider query fails to return any resource. It could be a product issue or a configuration issue. Verify that there is at least resource satifies query logic. Investigate OSLC provider's query implementation.
OAuth Failures of this type occur when ... Create OAuth ... Adjust OAuth... Verify OAuth ... Investigate OAuth ...
Failures/Errors of this type occur when ... Create a public static parameter ... Adjust a public static parameter... Verify a public static parameter ... Investigate a public static parameter ...
Unknown Host Exception Failures of this type occur when ... Check connectivity ... Adjust network settings... Verify baseUri is valid and accessible ... Investigate network adapter ...
Network Connection Failures of this type occur when ... Check connectivity ... Adjust network settings... Verify baseUri hostname and port is valid and accessible ... Investigate network adapter ...
Compilation Failures of this type occur when ... Check compilation ... Adjust compilation... Verify compilation ... Investigate compilation ...
Source string failures of this type occur when ... Check arguments for source string ... Adjust source string ... Verify source string ... Investigate source string ...
Single Client Connection Failures of this type occur when ... Check connectivity ... Adjust network settings... Verify baseUri is valid and accessible ... Investigate network adapter ...
Single Client Connection Failures of this type occur when ... Check connectivity ... Adjust network settings... Verify baseUri is valid and accessible ... Investigate network adapter ...
<error type="AppBehavior" regexp="expected:<400> but was:<500>"> Product Defect Submit defect against the OSLC provider
Content-type Failures of this type occur when ... Check content-type ... Adjust content-type... Verify content-type ... Investigate content-type ...
Response Code Failures of this type occur when ... Check Response Code ... Adjust Response Code... Verify Response Code ... Investigate Response Code ...
